items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 75 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 16!
Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 8 years on Untappd!
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 170 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 35!
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 210 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 43!
It's New Brew Thursday! Drink any beer you have never had before on three different Thursdays in a 20 day period.

items.checkin_comment: Mar '16. Bottled, 500ml from Clarkes of Whitby, North Yorkshire.

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 15 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 4!
Had enough tea and biscuits? Head to the pub for a pint! That's at least 45 beers from the UK. Try 5 more for Level 10.

items.badge_description: Get that gluten out of here! Thankfully these days, even if you cant eat gluten, you can still enjoy a refreshing gluten-free brew. That's 10 different Gluten Free beers. Try 5 more for Level 3.

items.checkin_comment: Crisp, clean and hoppy.  A decent GF while still having a bit of body.

user.bio: New to this, but love my beer.  Something of a "Pale Ale Evangelist", but also enjoy the occasional stout or sour
Mostly cans at home, cheap cask at spoons & craft at head of steam

Love to play golf   Enjoy new brews.

"ONE KIND WORD CAN CHANGE SOMEONES ENTIRE DAY"  BEER!!

Jurassic beer hunter. 9300 beers, 7800 on cask. 1200 brewery ticks.
Need a new hobby! #Staggersaurus.

items.badge_description: Get that gluten out of here! Thankfully these days, even if you cant eat gluten, you can still enjoy a refreshing gluten-free brew. That's 5 different Gluten Free beers. Try 5 more for Level 2.

items.checkin_comment: Sweet hay dipped in orange juice, sweet, clean with a hint of a grainy mouthfeel.  Thin to moderate body, hints of citrus coming through but fruits take over. Smooth linger of hoppy mandarin .  Refreshing.
